name: Slidr
description:
Slidr is a fun cube dodging game that I made within only 48 hours start to finish. The first version of the game a more of a teaser build and as I add more components I will release more fleshed out builds but the current version has enough to let you experience the general idea of the game and get you keen for future developments and versions to come.

V0.02 IS OUT NOW!!!!

Download the  Slidr launcher that will keep you up to date with a the latest updates from now into the future.

V0.02 Patch Notes:

-New Endless Mode:

             -Randomly constructed levels

             -High score Saved

-Levels are now selected from levels page and play button is replaced by endless mode

Stuff To Expect In the Next Update:

-Online Scoreboard for Endless Mode

-Cube Customisation

Slidr is programmed and designed by Luke O'Connor
